channel.title: [PI] Eating Animation Bug
channel.description:
[B]Project Insanity:
When I eat with any Godsword, it doesn't show the eating animation. How do I fix that?[/B]

item.title: [PI] Eating Animation Bug
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

find the variable used for doing an animation ( don’t know it by heart sorry )

in the eating class just add c.startAnim(animid);

quite easy.

[hr]

What does a godsword have to do with anything? o.0 are you saying it does it without a weapon but with a weapon it doesn’t?

that would be uh…

Animations class client sided if I remember correctly?

Edit: really you should have a better anim cache file…but meh whatever that’s the cheapfix way
